log-access-subtitle: Monitor multi-site traffic streams, spot anomalies, and export forensic evidence in seconds.
log-access-card-requests-hint: Cluster-wide HTTP requests captured in the current retention window.
log-access-card-visitors-hint: De-duplicated visitors based on IP + User-Agent fingerprint.
log-access-card-bandwidth-hint: Aggregated response payload delivered across all sites.
log-access-card-suspicious-hint: Blocked probes, brute-force attempts, and abnormal referers detected.
log-access-trend-desc: Daily traffic breakdown with page view and unique visitor baseline.
log-access-trend-empty: Traffic trend data is not available yet.
log-access-pie-desc: Status code health and source distribution overview.
log-access-realtime-desc: Newest 25 requests across the cluster with live latency snapshots.
log-access-realtime-empty: No realtime log events have been captured.
log-access-realtime-hint: Stream updates every 10 seconds when the collector is active.
log-access-table-desc: Compare request volume, visitor reach, and anomalies per site.
log-access-alerts-desc: High-frequency IPs, crawler spikes, and risky referers are surfaced here.
log-access-alert-crawler-desc: %s crawler hits were recorded in the past hour.
log-access-alert-recent-block-desc: Security rules stopped abnormal requests less than an hour ago.
log-access-alert-demo-desc: Connect live log ingestion agents to populate real alerts.
log-access-history-desc: Indexed list for quick forensic search and export.
log-access-history-hint: Use the export button to archive filtered results for compliance.
